disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

srcR.Wiki: Color information (R) of the map image before conversion. Pixels with matching RGB values are associated with this parameter

srcG.Wiki: Color information (G) of the map image before conversion. Pixels with matching RGB values are associated with this parameter

srcB.Wiki: Color information (B) of the map image before conversion. Pixels with matching RGB values are associated with this parameter

weatherLogId.Wiki: Weather lottery ID (-1: No setting (default value))
